local_intent: Perceive the T-block, set yaw and align, execute a 0.2m push along 0 degrees, then verify visibility.
assumptions: 0-degree push aligns with desired goal direction in this frame
Visual continuity after push is acceptable as a minimal verification
coherence_with_global: Implements the perceive->align->push flow from GLOBAL_BT: conditional scan, detect, set yaw 90, align with tolerance 0.005, push 0.2 at 0 deg, then verify by visibility.
